BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEin Mihel þe archangel & his felawes alsobeþ biteyn god & ous to scheue what we scholle do…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou god for þe loue of sein Mihel ous lete such lif ledeþat we mote to heuen come after þat we beþ deþe
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxii” added to right margin by later hand (f. 136).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLHar4196.First Lines: SAint Nicholas þe nobil clerkþat witti was in goddis werk…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And al þai endid in goddes seruisegod graunt us to end on swilk wise
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Hic incipit historia sancto Nicholao Episcopo (rubric, f. 135vb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 11-16.
